author: Kelly McLaughlin
title: Some Americans are receiving stimulus checks on behalf of their dead relatives
description: Americans have said on social media that they're receiving stimulus money for deceased relatives. Stimulus money was sent to anyone who filed a 2019 or 2018 tax return, and if one was filed before a person died, there's a possibility that he or she were still…
content:
As Americans started receiving their stimulus checks this week some people realized that their deceased relatives were also getting funds.
Numerous Americans, including Kentucky Rep. Thomas Massie, spoke about friends and relatives receiving money that was a… [+2373 chars]
